content.en: Optimizing batch processing: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms, such as Ant Colony Optimization (ACO) and Genetic Algorithm (GA), to improve scheduling and optimization in batch processing machines. These algorithms have shown promising results in minimizing makespan, improving solution quality, and outperforming other heuristics and algorithms. The proposed algorithms are effective and efficient, especially for large-scale instances, making them valuable tools in various industries.
content.da: Optimering af batchbehandling: Forskere har udforsket brugen af algoritmer, såsom Ant Colony Optimization (ACO) og Genetic Algorithm (GA), til at forbedre planlægning og optimering i batchbehandlingsmaskiner. Disse algoritmer har vist lovende resultater i at minimere makespan, forbedre løsningskvaliteten og overgå andre heuristikker og algoritmer. De foreslåede algoritmer er effektive og effektive, især for store skalaer, hvilket gør dem værdifulde værktøjer i forskellige industrier.
